thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Orasure Q4 Revenue Rose 47 Percent To $52 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orasure Q4 Revenue Rose 47 Percent To $52 Million
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Orasure Technologies Inc:
* ORASURE ANNOUNCES RECORD 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 47 PERCENT TO $52 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 LOSS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.06 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $40 MILLION TO $41 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11, REVENUE VIEW $47.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $40.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
